nodes.text: 2R-CH, also known as Torch, was a battle droid equipped with a flamethrower who worked with the Advozse Hegemony during the Cold War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire. Around 3643 BBY, 2R-CH occupied Hammer Station with other Hegemony forces and was eventually destroyed by a strike team that proceeded to destroy the space station.

2R-CH "Torch" is one of the three enemies, along with Vorgan the Volcano and Sawbones Gjonfs, who comprise Riflor's Champions, the second boss encounter in the "Hammer Station" Flashpoint in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic. With Game Update 2.0 and the addition of a Hard Mode for Hammer Station, 2R-CH's character model was changed to a different type of droid.
